text:
⇒ Valentine E, Evans C (2001) The effects of solo singing, choral singing and swimming on mood and physiological indices. Psychology and Psychotherapy 74/1 115-120: Engaging in these activities (solo singing, choral singing and swimming) reduced tense arousal and increased energetic arousal, positive hedonic tone and heart rate
